column5: Ok, I love my ice hut, but am thinking of putting some flotation under it.   Any idea of how I can mount a 9.9 to it?   http://i131.photobucket.com/albums/p304/pa.../P1000549-1.jpg  http://i131.photobucket.com/albums/p304/pa.../P1000559-1.jpg  http://i131.photobucket.com/albums/p304/pa.../P1000558-1.jpg  Bottom Views   http://i131.photobucket.com/albums/p304/pa...en/P1000552.jpg  http://i131.photobucket.com/albums/p304/pa...en/P1000553.jpg  Entropy

Here's what I would do! Cover up all but one of the holes in the floor. Attach a fan, sized to fit the hole, above the whole and in turn, attach a 9.9 motor to the fan. Now, get a good quality tarp, attach it to the circumferance of the hut, glue it down to be air tight. Start the 9.9 and you've got yerself a hover craft! Good for any ice/water/chunks your gonna run into!
Great idea !!!  Do you think this fan will work? lol  http://i131.photobucket.com/albums/p304/pa...en/P1000565.jpg
I might go with a little bigger blade!!LOL HH
With this powerful motor can be hard on the hut when it goes on plane, so mount the motor backward and use only reverse gear. My 0.02$
You know your right.... don't want her breaking up half way on plane.
